Text: i love it when an uploader puts up a movie and doesnt fucking seed his own shit, how are we suppose to finish downloading when not even one person finished the movie before he abandoned ship!
I havn't abandoned ship... just because it says I'm not seeding doesn't mean as such... VPN works funny sometimes.

For fuck's sake, man. ALWAYS include at least a 30 second sample for something as large as this.

If you need help for mkv files, search: mkvtoolnix. It is the default tools for splitting/joining/etc mkv files.
Future videos will include a sample. I assure you it is good thou.
